MATCHMAKING IS GARBAGE... EVEN SBMM in COLD WAR is 10-times better than this shit... So many times I got matched as Bronze IV (Killer, 65h playtime) against full iridescent IV-I lobbies... DEVs should stop smoking weed and get their shit right

What can I say?

Cured my Depression? Yes.

Fed my Mask Kink? Yes.

Turned me into a dirty Slout for Ghostface? Abso-fricken-lutely Yes.

11/10 Ghosty stab me pls would buy again

Petition: Take Bubba out of the game thank you.

Забегая вперед, скажу сразу, игру я советую. Но запомните, что к ней не надо относиться серьезно. 

Основная проблема игры заключается в том, что люди чрезмерно серьезно относятся к ней. Как будто это киберспортивная дисциплина. Я попадаюсь на подобных токсиков в каждой первой игре. Я играю только за манов и мне абсолютно непонятны претензии сурвов. Что бы ты не делал, ты всегда кэмпер, тунеллер и дальше со всеми остановками. Но ребят... Я же в игре маньяк! Я должен творить всякую дичь, мне без разницы какие вы правила придумали для себя. Я лишь использую те механики, которые мне дали разработчики и моя задача вас всех перебить, а может и не всех, я волен делать все что Я хочу. И не моя вина, что вы это не можете законтрить. 

Будьте проще и просто угарайте.

I started during the 2021 Anniversary event and been playing quite a bit since.
If you dont take the game too seriously it is very fun with friends. 
There is a pretty serious grind for bloodpoints (the only way you can get BP is by playing the game) but Its not the biggest issue for me personally. 
There are some hit reg issues because the netcode is a bit sus at times but overall this game is a solid 8/10
Cool game as long as you're fine with occasionally being tunneled by the killer, but great game
Love the vibe, it has a mixture of thrill and chill

Developers dont give a damn about this game nor care about the health of it. Clunky mess, full of bugs, and somehow always breaks when a new chapter comes out.  All they want is money... oh and stealing content they dont own  :)

New player experience kinda sucks

1. No Unranked/ AI/ Free roam matches, so you can't get a feel of each map when game awareness is crucial. I don’t mind practicing in ranked matches but...

2. Survivors take ages to queue, Killer isn’t much better. Perhaps many players have already left and not enough people are playing in 2021. I also seem to be matched with very experienced players. Because of the lack of unranked matches, you have to practice in ranked matches but getting stomped in a match after a 10 mins queue doesn’t feel good.

3. Perks/Gear seems to take a while to get when you start out. So if you get into a match as a new player, you are at a huge disadvantage. Which could be attributed to new players like me being stomped easily.

4. Each character is on a separate progression(even items!), so sometimes when you try to level or just trying out other characters. You have to work with minimal perk slots/items. I don’t think I have been in a single match where people are working with a single perk slot or no items like me. This would be fine with grinding, but the queue is so long, making grinding for levels very difficult and unfun.

In conclusion, the Survivors queue is impossible to get in while Killer matches tend to feel terrible when you are a new player. This is more apparent when you are playing the Killer, because you will be matched with people who have way more experience/have way better perk/gear than you. Lack of features such as free roam make practicing difficult, therefore you will likely get stomped for a long while before you can improve. Game could be entertaining if you have 4 other friends playing with you, however starting to play this on your own in 2021 seems like a pretty bad experience. In short, I do not recommend anyone starting to play this at this point.
